# <a name="empty-inbox"></a><span data-ttu-id="d7f5b-102">Prazno prijemno poštansko sanduče</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d7f5b-102">Empty inbox</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d7f5b-103">**Moj Outlook.com prijemno poštansko sanduče je prazno**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d7f5b-103">**My Outlook.com inbox is empty**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d7f5b-104">Određeni programski dodaci u pregledaču Firefox mogu da spreče učitavanje prijemnog poštanskog sandučeta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d7f5b-104">Certain add-ons in the Firefox browser might prevent your inbox from loading.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d7f5b-105">Posetite Firefox podrška da biste saznali kako da [onemogućite ili uklonite dodatke](https://aka.ms/mozilla-add-ons).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d7f5b-105">Visit Firefox support to learn how to [disable or remove Add-ons](https://aka.ms/mozilla-add-ons).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d7f5b-106">**Želim da ispraznim prijemno poštansko sanduče**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d7f5b-106">**I want to empty my inbox**</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d7f5b-107">Ako želite da ispraznite Prijemno sanduče i izbrišete sve e-poruke:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d7f5b-107">If you want to empty your inbox and delete all your email:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="d7f5b-108">Izbor kruga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d7f5b-108">Select the circle</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="d7f5b-109">pored [prijemnog poštanskog sandučeta](https://outlook.live.com/mail/inbox) na vrhu liste poruka da biste izabrali sve poruke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d7f5b-109">next to [Inbox](https://outlook.live.com/mail/inbox) at the top of your message list to select all your messages.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="d7f5b-110">Na vrhu stranice izaberite stavku **prazna fascikla** (ili **ispraznite fokusirano**  /  **prazno drugo** ako je uključeno fokusirano Prijemno sanduče).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d7f5b-110">At the top of the page, select **Empty folder** (or **Empty Focused** / **Empty Other** if Focused Inbox is turned on).</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="d7f5b-111">Izaberite stavku **Izbriši sve**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d7f5b-111">Select **Delete all**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="d7f5b-112">Da biste očistili sve izbrisane poruke, otvorite [fasciklu izbrisane stavke](https://outlook.live.com/mail/deleteditems) i izaberite stavku **Isprazni fasciklu**  >  **Izbriši sve**, a zatim izaberite stavku **spasi stavke izbrisane iz ove fascikle** na vrhu stranice i ponovo izaberite stavku **prazna fascikla** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d7f5b-112">To purge all your deleted messages, open your [Deleted Items folder](https://outlook.live.com/mail/deleteditems) and select **Empty folder** > **Delete all**, then select **Recover items deleted from this folder** at the top of the page and select **Empty folder** again.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d7f5b-113">Više informacija potražite u članku [Brisanje e-pošte u Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/a9b63739-5392-412a-8e9a-d4b02708dee4?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d7f5b-113">For more information, see [Delete email in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/a9b63739-5392-412a-8e9a-d4b02708dee4?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy)</span></span>
